original_text: All the Jewish leaders who sat there in the meeting looked carefully at Stephen. They saw that his face was very bright, like the face of an angel.
korean_text: 공회 중에 앉은 사람들이 다 스데반을 주목하여 보니 그 얼굴이 천사의 얼굴과 같더라

sentences.original_text: All the Jewish leaders who sat there
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에 앉아 있던 모든 유대 지도자들은

sentences.original_text: They saw that his face was very bright
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 얼굴이 매우 밝은 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: like the face of an angel
